title: Games Workshop says its senior managers aren't excited about AI, prohibits its use and laments that it's 'included on our phones or laptops whether we like it or not'
description: The CEO of all things Warhammer says "we do not allow AI generated content or AI to be used in our design processes".

title: Hisense Debuts Movable 27-Inch Smart Display With Battery Power And AI Fitness Tools - channelnews.com.au
description: Hisense Debuts Movable 27-Inch Smart Display With Battery Power And AI Fitness Tools channelnews.com.auCES 2026: Hisense Wheels Out S6 FollowMe Mobile Smart Screen That Doesn’t Actually ‘Follow You’ Smarthouse.com.au

title: Asia’s AI Gamble: A Bold Vision Fraught with Risks
description: Amid economic uncertainty and geopolitical risks, nearly half of Asia's corporate leaders are embracing artificial intelligence, one of the most disruptive and least understood forces in modern business.

title: India launches AI platform to combat child trafficking
description: India launched Raksha, an AI platform to combat child trafficking, child marriage, and online exploitation. Raksha analyzes data to identify hotspots, networks, and online activity. The platform aims to strengthen child protection through data-driven prevention and intervention.

title: Hisense Debuts Movable 27-Inch Smart Display With Battery Power And AI Fitness Tools
description: Hisense has lifted the curtain on its latest smart screen, introducing the X7 Pro, a 27-inch movable display designed to adapt to a wide range of everyday uses. The device has launched in China with a price of approximately A$1,200, and pre-orders are already open through JD.com. While the company has yet to release a [...]
